segments.text: I observe the indoor kitchen with its angled view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink area has water flowing out uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman stands there, drying a plate unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in the puddle, apron and all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes wait on the counter beside her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above shows a tidy garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the boy climbs the stool to the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookie jar is full, and he's helping himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is about to tip over backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, palm open for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're conspiring quietly behind the woman's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage is starting on the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears or broken bones.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful outside makes the inside seem even messier.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't look away from the impending chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
